title: Horsemens Pride 2-Step Mounting Block
features: Built in handle for easy lifting
Ideal for mounting, grooming or other barn chores
description: Horsemen's Pride 2-Step Mounting Block Please Note: This product is made to order. Lead time is approximately three weeks. This step is ideal for mounting, grooming, or any other barn or household chores. Designed of high-density polyethylene for strength and durability. This step's smooth, lightweight design makes it easy to transport. Measures 15" high x 18 3/4" wide with two 10" deep steps. Built in Handle for easy lifting. Holds up to 300 lbs.
